channel.title: PsExec on PetterTech
channel.description: Recent content in PsExec on PetterTech

item.title: Resetting the Discretionary Access Control List (DACL) in a Windows Service security descriptor
item.description: OpenService FAILED 5: Access is denied. — “Oh crap!” If you ever see this error and need to reset the DACL on a Windows service, let’s say in case you (or someone else) accidentally deletes it, or configure it to something that prevents you from reading it’s security settings, this might do the trick: First of all, get a cup of coffee. Download PsExec (a tool in PsTools), which among other things allow you to run commands as the “local system” account.
